nodes.text: The Imperial Treasury was a governmental agency for the Galactic Empire. They were headquartered on the city-spanning world of Coruscant. During the time of the Galactic Civil War, following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, Vice-Regent Accountant Llohm Dunney worked at the Treasury. The Imperial Collection Agency was an arm of the Imperial Treasury responsible for collecting revenues through fines and taxes. The Imperial Treasury was known to collect a large percentage of profits that came from activities taking place on The Wheel, a large space station located in the Besh Gorgon system of the Mid Rim.
